description: This file defines route endpoints for managing notes in a RESTful API using Express. It includes route handlers for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, with associated Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles retrieving a paginated list of notes with optional search and filter parameters.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles creation of a new note with title, content, and tags.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a note specified by ID.
